subject: Thank you, we are accepting your refinance appication
body:
Your your credit report does not matter to us!
 
If your family OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
 
$220,000+ debt
 
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have set the lowest entire payment!
 
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply complete this simple form... 
 
Do not worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
 
http://duplejkxiformrx.com/
